Package model.fruit

Class Fruit

java.lang.Object
model.GameObject
model.DynamicObject
model.fruit.Fruit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
Direct Known Subclasses:
BubbleFruit, InvincibleFruit, LifeFruit, NormalFruit
public abstract class Fruit extends DynamicObject implements Subject
The Fruit class handles how the fruit is created and interacts with the hero.
The normal fruit is created after a bubble containing an enemy is popped.
The other three are the power up fruit which will show only one of the three in each level.
Four types of fruits one normal fruit, one bubble fruit, one invincible fruit,and one life fruit.
It's a dynamic object. It is also the subject in observer pattern.

    • Fruit

      public Fruit​(int x, int y, GameController gameController, javafx.scene.image.ImageView fruitImageView, int pointValue)
      Fruit constructor
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the fruit
      y - The y coordinate of the fruit
      gameController - The main controller of the game
      fruitImageView - The imageView of the fruit
      pointValue - The point of the fruit. Different types different points.

  • Method Details

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(Hero hero)
      Handle when fruit collides with hero. If collides notify to all the observers and remove the fruit on the screen.

      Handle some of the fruit which has super power. 3 types of fruit has super power.
